desc: Honrr delivers customized gifts for all occasions. We know you have a choice, We invite you to discover products that are sustainably sourced, use no harsh chemicals, and never tested on animals. We all have a choice, with HONRR you are sending more than a gift, it's an invitation to do better.

layout.text: Select an already curated gift, or you pick, then we pack and deliver, beautifully.
